search.noMatchFilter: No coins match the filter criteria

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.warning: Please only send {{currency}} to this address. Sending other assets may result in permanent loss.

xrp.destinationTagWarning: Please always enter this Destination Tag when sending XRP. Forgetting to enter it may result in loss of funds.

notices.wrongNetworkWarning: Sending from other networks may result in loss of funds

faq.title: FAQ
faq.howToDepositAnswer: Send {{asset}} using the selected network ({{network}}). Minimum deposit is {{minDeposit}} {{asset}}, requiring {{minConf}} confirmations.
faq.whenReflected: When will my deposit be reflected?
faq.whenReflectedAnswer: Your balance will be updated after {{minConf}} confirmations on the blockchain. Time may vary depending on network conditions.
faq.wrongNetwork: What if I sent to the wrong network?
faq.wrongNetworkAnswer: Funds sent to a network other than the selected chain/network may not be recoverable. Always verify the network before sending.
faq.xrpTagRequiredAnswer: Yes. You must enter the specified Destination Tag. Missing or incorrect tags may result in permanent loss of funds.
faq.tronConfirmation: How long does TRON confirmation take?
faq.tronConfirmationAnswer: Approximately 19 blocks for finality (depending on network conditions). TRC-20 (USDT) also requires waiting for Transfer event confirmation.
faq.adaUtxo: Are there any considerations for ADA UTXO?
faq.adaUtxoAnswer: Cardano uses the UTXO model, so transactions may be split into multiple inputs/outputs. There may be differences in history reflection.

toast.connectionLost: Real-time deposit monitoring connection lost. Please try manual refresh.
toast.connectionRestoredDesc: Real-time deposit monitoring has been restored.
toast.xrpAddressCopied: XRP address and Destination Tag copied.
toast.depositDetectedDesc: {{amount}} {{asset}} deposit detected. Please wait for confirmation.
toast.depositCompleteDesc: {{amount}} {{asset}} deposit complete and reflected in balance.
toast.depositErrorDesc: An error occurred during deposit processing. Please contact support.

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.pageDescription: Crypto Withdrawal: Select asset and network, enter withdrawal address and amount to withdraw.

balance.insufficientMessage: Exceeds available balance of {{balance}} {{coin}}. Use the 100% button to enter the maximum withdrawal amount.

notices.title: Important Notices
notices.addressMatch: Please ensure the address and network match. Incorrect transfers may result in loss of funds.
notices.networkCongestion: Processing may take time due to network congestion.

toast.submittedDesc: Withdrawal request for {{amount}} {{coin}} to {{network}} network submitted.

confirm.title: Confirm Withdrawal
confirm.message: Please confirm the withdrawal details below.

confirm.message: Please confirm the transfer details below.
